settings.helpText: Build up the content of the page using the content system or "consys"

To build up a nested navigation structure, assign this page to a parent page. This helps to build up the site URL structure. e.g. Widget may have a parent Page of Products. Resulting in the URL; /products/widget.html. If left empty, it will assume that Home is the parent page.
Specify an image for this page.  Maybe be used as a thumbnail as a representation of this page or when shared on social media.
If populated all links to this page will link out to the external URL.
Configure the Meta data for a page, such as descriptions and social tags
Specify the Tags that you would like to associate with this content.
This field makes up the URL that this content will sit on. Your home page must have a name of index, to signify that this is the root page.
